Updating version.
First refactor pass: Remove all logic offers from MainActivity, put into OfferUtils.

2nd refactor pass.

After we made OfferUtils ortogonal, I've proceeded to formalize the
commonalities between the different Affiliate SDKs and created an
`Affiliate` interface as well as a `InterstitialListener` interface.

I've broken all the static methods that existed in `OfferUtils`, now
called `Offers` and created `Affiliate` implementations for each one
of the sdks.
load new applovin ad after a succesful display.
bug with inmobi fixed.
update the activity reference when it's time to show interstitial.

DRY refactor.

Now that affiliates follow an interface initialization code has
been rid of code repetition when initializing and displaying
interstitials.

Made Affiliate interface require a loadNewInterstitial() method.

Made AppLovin try to load a new ad 30mins later if no fill on the
previous ad request. (like InMobi)

Cleanup and code formatting.
New Affiliate.stop(), DRY on Offers.stopAffiliates().
Remove Torrent and Data on finished torrent transfers now available.

Cleanup and refactor.

rename refactor.
Missing display listener on interstitial DIALOG. More naming refactors.

More judicious use of threads for AdNetworks.

- OfferUtils now has a fixed sized thread pool
- All adNetworks and adapters make use of such thread pool.
- Removed logic to attempt ad re-request 30mins later, ad network
providers say if there's no fill, further requests will likely
fail as well.
